events.name: USC Trojans at Ohio State Buckeyes

headlines.description: Playoff-snubbed Ohio State got a bit defensive even without one of its best defenders in the Cotton Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Playoff-snubbed Ohio State 24-7 over USC in Cotton Bowl

video.headline: Buckeyes capitalize on Trojans' struggles for 24-7 win

notes.headline: FRANKLIN AMERICAN MORTGAGE MUSIC CITY BOWL

headlines.description: Northwestern coach Pat Fitzgerald made it back-to-back bowl wins for the first time in program history as the Wildcats beat Kentucky at the Music City Bowl on Friday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Northwestern edges Kentucky in Music City Bowl

video.headline: Kentucky goes for two and the win, but falls short

events.name: NC State Wolfpack at Arizona State Sun Devils

headlines.description: Nyheim Hines had three 5-yard touchdown runs to help North Carolina State beat Arizona State 52-31 on Friday in the Sun Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: NC State beats Arizona State 52-31 in Sun Bowl

events.name: Wake Forest Demon Deacons at Texas A&M Aggies

headlines.description: John Wolford threw for 400 yards and four touchdowns, and Matt Colburn ran for 150 yards and the go-ahead score in Wake Forest's 55-52 victory over Texas A&M on Friday in the Belk Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolford throws 4 TD passes, Wake Forest tops Texas A&M 55-52

video.headline: Wake Forest stuns Texas A&M in Belk Bowl

events.name: New Mexico State Aggies at Utah State Aggies

headlines.description: Larry Rose III scored on a 21-yard run in overtime and New Mexico State won in its first bowl game in 57 years, beating Utah State 26-20 in the Arizona Bowl on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: New Mexico State beats Utah State 26-20 in Arizona Bowl
